Application.Controller

Class VisionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.VisionController

  • @SessionAttributes(value={"limit","scenarioId"})
 @Controller
public class VisionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing Visions. When a User creates a new Vision some actions are done differently with respect to what and Administrator does (see VisionManagementController).
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getVision

        @RequestMapping(value="/vision",
                method={POST,GET})
public java.lang.String getVision(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                      @RequestParam(name="scenarioId",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                      int scenarioId,
                                                                                                      @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                      @CookieValue(value="localeInfo",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String lang,
                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="lang",required=false)
                                                                                                      java.lang.String language)
        Returns the page for creating new Visions from the User side.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        scenarioId - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        user_id - cookie of the User creating of the new Vision.
        lang - String, language code from locale cookie.
        language - String, language code passed as query-string parameter.
        Returns:
        "vision" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • saveVision

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveVision",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String saveVision(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                     int scenarioId,
                                                                                                     @ModelAttribute(value="vision")
                                                                                                     Vision vision,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="layoutToUse")
                                                                                                     int layout,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="picturesList")
                                                                                                     java.lang.String picturesListStr,
                                                                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                     @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                     java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="pickQueryWords")
                                                                                                     java.lang.String pickQueryWords,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="searchQueryWords")
                                                                                                     java.lang.String searchQueryWords)
                                                                                              throws PictureCreationException,
                                                                                                     UnsplashConnectionException
        Implements the creation and persisting of a new Vision from the User side.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        request - see HttpServletRequest.
        scenarioId - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        vision - Spring ModelAttribute containing information about the new Vision.
        layout - Integer representing the chosen layout for the Vision. It is used to build the Vision server-side.
        picturesListStr - String containing the URLs of the pictures to merge for the new Vision. URLs are ";" separated.
        result - see BindingResult.
        user_id - cookie of the User creating of the new Vision.
        pickQueryWords - List of the search terms used on Unsplash that are also part of the Keywords.
        searchQueryWords - List of the search terms used on Unsplash.
        Returns:
        • "redirect:/match" if the User has played less than 5 Matches
        • "redirect:/feed" otherwise
        string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
        Throws:
        PictureCreationException - PictureCreationException, exception in creating photo collage for the new Vision.
        UnsplashConnectionException - UnsplashConnectionException, exception in connecting to Unsplash's APIs.

      • searchOnUnsplash

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/getUnsplashPics",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String searchOnUnsplash(@RequestParam(value="keyword")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String keyword,
                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="pageNum")
                                                                                                                              int pageNumber,
                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="lang")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String lang)
                                                                                                                       throws TranslateException,
                                                                                                                              UnsplashConnectionException
        Relays the request to unsplashConnector for requesting the next batch of photos from Unsplash.
        Parameters:
        keyword - String used as search term on Unplash.
        pageNumber - Integer used to keep track of pagination of Unsplash results.
        lang - String, language code.
        Returns:
        JSON formatted String containing the response from Unsplash's APIs.
        Throws:
        TranslateException - TranslateException, exception in translating search terms to English.
        UnsplashConnectionException - UnsplashConnectionException, exception in connecting to Unsplash's APIs.
